category.name: Integration.CATIA

preference.name: CATIA_refresh_bom_window_on_load_2
preference.preference_description: Defines the BOM window behavior during the load process. Possible values: YES = Refresh the BOM window during the load process NO = Do not refresh the BOM window during the load process WARNING = Provide prompt to refresh the BOM window during the load process
